column4: [Global Notice] The GNOME foundation has been forced to defend its trademark against Groupon. This goes beyond just GNOME; this is about the FLOSS community showing the corporate world that our trademarks will be defended; not just by specific victims, but by all of us. Our stance can be found at http://blog.freenode.net/2014/11/helping-gnome-defend-its-trademark/ while GNOME's can be found at http://www.gnome.org/groupon/
